goods which are even greater. If God had so created the world that it contained
no evil at all, that world would have been less good, all things considered, than
it is even with all the evil it contains. This is called the greater goods defense.
The Christian may say: we humans rightly do many things we expect to
cause  avoidable  harm.  We  build  a  bridge  from  San  Francisco  to  Marin
County, knowing that in the construction some workmen will fall into the
